summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 5.3, 15.1, 16.1, 17.1, 17A.1, and 18.1 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to prohibit signs located upon and supported by the roof or parapot of a building or structure in zones other that the M, IG and IH Zones, and to terminate certain non-conforming signs.
